channel.title: CVE Feed for Paytm -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Paytm -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-45362|2024-08-03T14:09:57.023Z -- paytm -- paytm%20payment%20gateway
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Paytm Paytm Payment Gateway.This issue affects Paytm Payment Gateway: from n/a through 2.7.0.

item.title: CVE-2022-45805|2024-08-03T14:17:04.091Z -- paytm -- paytm%20payment%20gateway
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Paytm Paytm Payment Gateway paytm-payments allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Paytm Payment Gateway: from n/a through 2.7.3.
